card.name: Bronze-Arm Tribe
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

card.name: Dimension Gate
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Search your deck. You may take a creature from your deck, show that creature to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

card.name: Natural Snare
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and put it into his mana zone.

card.name: Barkwhip, the Smasher
card.text: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your Beast Folk. ■ While this creature is tapped, each of your other Beast Folk in the battle zone gets +2000 power.

card.name: Cocco Lupia
card.text: ■ Your creatures that have Dragon in their race each cost 2 less to summon. ''(Dragonoids don't count.)'' They can't cost less than 2.

card.name: Rikabu's Screwdriver
card.text: ■ Tap Ability

card.name: Faerie Life
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

card.name: Skysword, the Savage Vizier
card.text: ■ Multi ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. Then add the top card of your deck to your shields face down.

card.name: Sanfist, the Savage Vizier
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ Multi ■ When this creature would be discarded from your hand during your opponent's turn, you may put it into the battle zone instead.

card.name: Pala Olesis, Morning Guardian
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ During your opponent's turn, each of your other creatures gets +2000 power. ■ This creature can't attack players.

card.name: Courtney, Summer Breeze Faerie
card.text: ■ Cards in your mana zone are considered to be cards of every civilization.

card.name: Stronghold of Lightning and Flame
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 3000 or less. Then you may choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap it.

card.name: Heaven's Gate
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Put up to 2 non-evolution light creatures that have "blocker" from your hand to the battle zone.

card.name: Velyrika Dragon
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, search your deck. You may take an Armored Dragon from your deck, show that Armored Dragon to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck. ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Super Spark
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Tap all your opponent's creatures in the battle zone.

card.name: Flameburn Dragon
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 4000 or less.

card.name: Living Lithograph
card.text: ■ Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. If that card is a creature, each of your creatures in the battle zone gets +2000 power until the End Step

card.name: Wiz, White Knight Enlightener
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ Evolution—Put on one of your creatures that has "Blocker". ■ Double Breaker ■ Ignore any effects that would prevent your creatures that have "blocker" from attacking your opponent. ■ End Step

card.name: Cerulean Dagger Dragon
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may draw a card for each of your Dragons in the battle zone. ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Hyperspatial Faerie Hole
card.text: ■ Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. ■ Choose one of the following. :► Put any number of psychic creatures that have total cost 5 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. :► Put a nature psychic creature that costs 7 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. ■ Hyperspatial Psychic

card.name: Hyperspatial Shiny Hole
card.text: ■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap it. ■ Choose one of the following. :► Put any number of psychic creatures that have total cost 5 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. :► Put a light psychic creature that costs 7 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. ■ Hyperspatial Psychic

card.name: Chief De Baula, Machine King of Mystic Light
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may return a spell from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Terradragon Mildgarmus
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose a card in your opponent's mana zone and put it into their graveyard. Then put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

card.name: Gantora Maxivus
card.text: ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

card.name: Hyperspatial Shooting Hole
card.text: ■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has "blocker". ■ Put a Fire psychic creature that costs 9 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. ■ Hyperspatial Psychic

card.name: Alligator, the Awakened Flower Beast
card.text: ■ Whenever this creature attacks, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Caiman, Temporal Flower
card.text: ■ Awaken—Whenever this creature attacks your opponent and isn't blocked, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. After the attack, Alligator, the Awakened Flower Beast ■ Hyperspatial Psychic

card.name: Nakatsumaki, Godly Guns Elemental
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Murmur, Vizier of Formation
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ Each of your other creatures in the battle zone that have "blocker" gets +3000 power.

card.name: Ultimus, Divine Law Elemental
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ When this creature is destroyed, search your deck. You may take a spell that has "Shield Trigger" from your deck, show that spell to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

card.name: Corteo, Spirit Knight
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, for each of your creatures in the battle zone, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap it.

card.name: Kill, Temporal Brawler
card.text: ■ During your opponent's turn, whenever any of your psychic creatures would be returned to your hand by one of your opponent's spells or the ability of one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone, that creature stays in the battle zone instead. ■ Awaken—At the Step#Step 2 (Draw) ■ Hyperspatial Psychic

card.name: Setsudan, Awakened Giant
card.text: ■ Power Attacker ■ Double Breaker ■ Whenever any of your psychic creatures would be returned to your hand by one of your opponent's spells or the ability of one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone, that creature stays in the battle zone instead.

card.name: Hyperspatial Surprise Hole
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Choose one of the following. :► Put a psychic creature that costs 2 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. :► Put a light or water psychic creature that costs 4 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. ■ Hyperspatial Psychic

card.name: Reppi Aini
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may reveal the top 2 cards of your deck. You may take a spell that has Hyperspatial in its name from among them into your hand, then put the rest into your graveyard.

card.name: Julia Matina, the Awakened Diva
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ Whenever this creature blocks, add the top card of your deck to your shields face down.

card.name: Martini, Temporal Dancer
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack. ■ Awaken—When you put a creature that has "blocker" that costs 4 or more into the battle zone, Julia Matina, the Awakened Diva ■ Hyperspatial Psychic
